definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: Soybean isoflavones and procyanidins have be provided with reliable storage stability in Health Vino.
sentences.chinese: 大豆异黄酮与原花青素在保健酒中具有较好的稳定性。

sentences.english: How much procyanidins would you have to consume to feel the benefits?
sentences.chinese: 人体必须摄取多少原花青素才能起作用？

sentences.english: I use anthocyanidins and antioxidants in conjunction with the ozone therapy.
sentences.chinese: 我用的是臭氧治疗和抗氧化剂花青素与配合。

sentences.english: Acid increased the ratio of extraction of proanthocyanidins.
sentences.chinese: 酸提高了原花青素的提取率。

sentences.english: However, a similar study using bilberry anthocyanins did not reveal the same results.
sentences.chinese: 然而，越桔中的花青素就没有这种效果。

sentences.english: Grape seeds contain quantitative grape seeds oil (GSO) and procyanidins (PCs).
sentences.chinese: 葡萄籽中含有丰富的葡萄籽油和原花青素。

sentences.english: They have compounds called anthocyanins, one of the most powerfulforms of antioxidants.
sentences.chinese: 其含有的花青素为最强有力的抗氧化物之一。

sentences.english: Does the grape variety have any effect on the procyanidin levels?
sentences.chinese: 葡萄的品种与原花青素的含量有关吗？

sentences.english: Many genes are involved in the formation of anthocyanin pigments in the aleurone .
sentences.chinese: 糊粉层中花青素的形成涉及到许多基因。

sentences.english: Also increased the special effect of anthocyanins with skincare.
sentences.chinese: 还特增加了具有养颜美容的效果花青素。

sentences.english: Anthocyanins provide the dark colours of many fruits and vegetables, such as blueberries and red peppers.
sentences.chinese: 花青素使很多水果和蔬菜呈深色，如蓝莓和红柿子椒。

sentences.english: Studies on the optimum conditions in extracting mono-anthocyanin in Hibiscus sabdariffa L.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰茄花青素提取条件优化研究。

sentences.english: The health function and extraction technology of procyanidin from grape seed are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了葡萄籽原花青素的功能及提取工艺研究现状。

sentences.english: Procyanidins contents are significantly different among different kinds of grape seeds and grape skins.
sentences.chinese: 不同品种葡萄皮和葡萄籽中的原花青素含量有差异。

sentences.english: Proanthocyanidin is a effective natural free radical scavenger.
sentences.chinese: 原花青素是一种天然有效的自由基清除剂。

zi4 you2 ji1 qing1 chu2 ji4
